title: Russian Military Operation in Ukraine Roils Markets
sub_head: Attack sends stocks lower and oil rises above $105 a barrel
body:
Investors rushed for safety, pushing down stocks and lifting the prices of oil, gold and government bonds, after Russian missiles and airstrikes hit Ukraineâ€™s capital, Kyiv, and more than a dozen other cities across the country.
Futures tied to the S&P 500, Nasdaq-100 and Dow Jones Industrial Average fell between 1.4% and 2.2%. The S&P 500 reached correction territory earlier in the week, and futures are indicating the Dow is on track to do the same.
